newsitem.title: USA: Reuters 30-day muni supply rises to $8.821 bln.
newsitem.headline: Reuters 30-day muni supply rises to $8.821 bln.

text.p: Reuters said Friday it calculated its 30-day visible supply of upcoming municipal bond sales at $8.821 billion, up $3.8 billion from Thursday.
Negotiated sales total $6.243 billion in 86 issues and competitive bond sales total $2.578 billion in 164 issues.
Reuters visible supply counts all deals underwriters have either scheduled for sale in the next 30 business days, or have said they tentatively plan to price during the period.

The supply figure is based on sales data compiled by Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group and uses municipal securities with maturities 13 months or longer. All bond deals $1 million or larger are included.
